message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $1300000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. I'm willing to make a slight concession to get us started. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to negotiate further!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my valuation of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1250000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for a price of $1275000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. Let me know if this is acceptable to you or if you'd like to continue negotiating.
